00079 /* Since the concrete syntax is not set, use defines for delimiters 
00080  * Must use quoted strings for delimiter tokens
00081  */
00082 #define SECTION_START   "{"
00083 #define SECTION_END     "}"
00084 
00085 #define FIELD_START     "("
00086 #define FIELD_END       ")"
00087 
00088 #define ENTRY_START     "("
00089 #define ENTRY_END       ")"
00090 
00091 #define LINK_START      "("
00092 #define LINK_END        ")"
00093 
00094 #define CREATE_SECTION  "CREATE"
00095 
00096 #define TERMINATOR      ";"
00097 #define KLEENE_STAR     "*"
00098 #define OR_MARKER       "|"
00099 
00100 #define REPLACE_FIELD   "!"
00101 #define CONCAT_FIELD    "||"

00104 /* File pointer, used for reading MD file */
00105 typedef struct Fptr
00106 {
00107   Mptr *mptr;
00108   Mptr *checkpoint;             /* Checkpoint for error messages */
00109   Mbuf *source_name;            /* Source file name before preprocessing */
00110   int source_line;              /* Line number in unpreprocessed code */
00111 }
00112 Fptr;
